purpose: Enable deep search capabilities across various data sources using advanced AI techniques
principle: Utilizes machine learning models to perform semantic search and information retrieval from unstructured data
reusability: Offers a flexible API for integrating deep search functionalities into existing applications, supports plugin-based architecture for extending capabilities
limitations: May require substantial computational resources for large datasets, currently optimized for specific data types and formats
name: OpenDeepSearch
highlight: Advanced semantic search with machine learning for unstructured data
